name: minecraft-marketplace
description: Discord-native community marketplace for Minecraft server economies with evidence-based reporting and AI-enhanced item processing

scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.docker:integration: docker compose -f infrastructure/docker/compose.yml exec frontend curl -f http://backend:3001/health
scripts.docker:fresh-install: docker compose -f infrastructure/docker/compose.yml up --build -d && npm run docker:smoke-test
scripts.test: echo '⚠️  WARNING: This runs infrastructure-dependent tests (requires PostgREST + nginx)' && echo '💡 TIP: Use npm run test:fast for instant MSW-mocked tests' && vitest --config config/testing/vitest.config.ts
scripts.test:unit: echo '⚠️  WARNING: Unit tests may require infrastructure' && echo '💡 TIP: Use npm run test:fast for guaranteed fast tests' && vitest --config config/testing/vitest.unit.config.ts
scripts.test:all: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:speed:fast: npm run test:fast && echo '🚀 Fast tests completed!'
scripts.test:compose: docker compose -f config/docker/compose.test.yml up -d && npm run test:integration:containers; docker compose -f config/docker/compose.test.yml down
scripts.test:business-rules: echo '📋 Running business rules tests...' && vitest run tests/unit --reporter=verbose | grep -E '(business|rule|validation)'
scripts.test:error-handling: echo '🚨 Running error handling tests...' && vitest run tests/unit --reporter=verbose | grep -E '(error|exception|handling)'
scripts.test:integration:repositories: echo '🗄️ Running repository integration tests...' && vitest run tests/integration --reporter=verbose | grep -E '(repository|repo)'
scripts.test:authentication: echo '🔐 Running authentication tests...' && vitest run tests/unit --reporter=verbose | grep -E '(auth|login|discord)'
scripts.test:authorization: echo '🛡️ Running authorization tests...' && vitest run tests/unit --reporter=verbose | grep -E '(authz|permission|role)'
scripts.test:rls-policies: echo '🔒 Running RLS policy tests...' && vitest run tests/unit --reporter=verbose | grep -E '(rls|policy|security)'
scripts.test:search-performance: echo '🔍 Running search performance tests...' && vitest run tests/unit --reporter=verbose | grep -E '(search|performance)'
scripts.test:api-performance: echo '⚡ Running API performance tests...' && vitest run tests/performance
scripts.test:collaboration: echo '🤝 Testing: Can someone else actually use this project?' && vitest run --config config/testing/vitest.collaboration.config.ts
scripts.type-check: tsc --noEmit --project config/typescript/tsconfig.json && npm run type-check --workspace=workspaces/frontend && npm run type-check --workspace=workspaces/backend

author: Lead Dev + Wh1rledPeas
